body.p: To the honourable Thos E Bramlett governor of Kentucky the undersigned petitioners would represent unto your honor that at the last term of the Taylor Circuit Court a fine of $20 was assessed against Thomas Spratt, on an indictment for "gaming on the premises of an other" two persons were indicted for the same thing in different indictments, the proof in the two Cases was theby the same wintesses and was Pawt=ically the same in both cases the jury in one case acquitted the other, & fined Spratt, in his case, the proof was clear that the game was not played on the premises of the man named in the indictment, but on that of an other in the possession occupany & under the controll of an other -- Spratt is a poor man does not follow gaming & the proof stated they were only playing for 5 cents & but a single Game, the undersigned respectfully petition your honour to remit said fine.

J B McWhorter S. T. C
J. B. Beams Ds

To his Excellency T. E. Bramlett Governor of Ky
Sir.

Having investigated, the facts in the case of the within named Spratt said of the opinion that that it would not be detrimental to the public interest and to justice if the fine assessed against him, be remitted. I therefore respectfully ask that you will remit the Same.

Very Truly Your
J. C. Chandler

Taylor Cir Ct
vs
Thos Spratt
